title: Decorative helm (gold)

properties.value: The decorative helm (gold) can be bought from Castle Wars area south of the Observatory for 400 Castle Wars tickets. They can only be bought from Lanthus. The helmet has similar stats to an adamant med helm but weighs less, and requires level 30 Defence to wear.

SMW Subobject for NormalHigh Alchemy value: 1152Examine: A very decorative helm.Is members only: falseIs variant of: Decorative helm (gold)Uses infobox: ItemImage: File:Decorative helm (gold).pngWeight: 1.360Value: 1920Version anchor: NormalRelease date: 7 March 2005Item ID: 4511

The decorative helm (gold) can be bought from Castle Wars area south of the Observatory for 400 Castle Wars tickets. They can only be bought from Lanthus. The helmet has similar stats to an adamant med helm but weighs less, and requires level 30 Defence to wear.

When unprotected upon PvP death, this item will stay in the inventory, but will become broken and will require 5,000 coins to repair. However, if the death occurs beyond the level 20 of the Wilderness, the item will be lost instead. In either case, extra 5,000 coins will be dropped upon death for the opponent. After a regular death, the item can be retrieved from the gravestone without a fee—unless the death occurs beyond level 20 of the Wilderness, in which case 5,000 coins will appear in the gravestone instead.

This item can be stored in the armour case of a costume room, as part of the Castle Wars armour (3) set. Ultimate Ironmen will be unable to retrieve individual pieces until the full set is stored.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
14 July 2021
(update)

The medium helmet's ranged attack bonus has been increased from -1 to 0.

29 August 2019
(update)

The broken version was made available to free-to-play players.

20 July 2017
(update)

The item was made available to free-to-play players.

17 July 2007
(update)

The item was graphically updated.
